#nametype [nametype]: 134

summoned with #226 Summon Kenzoku (Conjuration 6)

Kenzoku are noble warrior-kami of great prowess. Once human, they were rewarded with immortality for their deeds. Kenzoku are popular kami among the samurai. They fight with magic swords made from their own essence and are surrounded by a divine aura that intimidates lesser beings.
